remarks: Lemma for proving nonnegative integer exponentiation closure laws. (Contributed by NM, 14-Dec-2005.)
statement:
expcllem.1 $e |- F C_ CC $.
expcllem.2 $e |- ( ( x e. F /\ y e. F ) -> ( x x. y ) e. F ) $.
expcllem.3 $e |- 1 e. F $.
expcllem $p |- ( ( A e. F /\ B e. NN0 ) -> ( A ^ B ) e. F ) $.
$d A x y $.
$d B x $.
$d F x y $.
